alert.note: Alert for McHenry (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 11:57AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Souris River near Westhope affecting Bottineau County. Souris River near Bantry affecting McHenry County. Souris River near Towner affecting McHenry County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue * WHERE...Souris River near Towner. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1454.0 feet, Minor flood stage with no significant problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1455.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to gradually fall through early next week. - Flood stage is 1454.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1455.4 feet on 07/06/2005. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
